title: Cuban Drummer Dafnis Prieto's Crisp Rhythms Are 'Good For Jazz'
teaser: Triangles and Circles, the new album from Dafnis Prieto, blends Afro-Cuban beats, blues feeling and spontaneous rhythmic variations. Critic Kevin Whitehead says that drums are at the album's heart.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
